SEARCH
Package com.cy_siao.dao

Class RelationshipDao

java.lang.Object
com.cy_siao.dao.RelationshipDao
public class RelationshipDao extends Object
Data Access Object class for managing relationship data between persons in the database. Handles CRUD operations for relationships between people.

  • Constructor Summary

    • findByPersons

      public Relationship findByPersons(Person person1, Person person2) throws SQLException
      Finds a relationship between two specific persons
      Parameters:
      person1 - The first person in the relationship
      person2 - The second person in the relationship
      Returns:
      The relationship if found, null otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs
